titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2905) to prevent the Federal Communications Commission from repromulgating the fairness doctrine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Pence. Petition No: 110-3. (Discharge petition text with signatures.)

bill.summary:
10/1/2007--Introduced.
Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2905 (Broadcaster Freedom Act of 2007).
